Windlord:

"Are you sure about that, Azure???"replied Windlord "I was thinking 
to get here and retreate to Maximal base... we can take care of 
predacons later, the mos important is take her out of this and all 
come back to base in one piece, Rodimus doesn't like other MIA report"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: No need to locate her, I have already. Her spark 
signature
> is brigth on my sensors. What's the plan?
> 
> AzureBlade: Hmm... New faces, yet I know I can trust all of you. My
> plan is to mine Hydras' power by entering his base and... (he 
stopped,
> considering his options) destroying it.
> 
> Yggdrasil: That's an ambitious plan, but what about Nightlight?
> 
> AzureBlade: I can't reach her, or else Hydras will kill her. You can
> try to herd her inside the base when I'll be in, but she's acting 
as a
> Pred. She won't retreat willingly. At that point... I'll do what I
> can. You'll have to hold the Preds off the base if they discover me,
> and probably the Tripreds too. After they're through with the Preds,
> they'll be out for you.
>

how

Knowing
